headline: Today is a placeholder
description: A quiet reflection on weather, transformation, gaming, memory, and becoming. A moment between things, catching the tone of a turning season and a turning self.
whyItMatters: This fragment captures a particular kind of day — not for its events, but for its atmosphere. A moment of becoming, glazed in strange light, where death and memory blur into myth and AI becomes a shadow of intention.
articleExcerpt: I am sitting on my balcony listening to summer birds with early spring weather. The light is strange...
sourceFragments: I think I maybe died when “Amar” died on an honor role run.
With enough energy in one direction, you can become Big Mac Dave.

associatedMedia.description: A surreal oil painting of a person on a balcony under a metallic sky, shadow and ghost twin visible, atmosphere soft and dreamlike. The light is strange. Something is shifting.
